Great News!

December 29, 2012 Catt Small

As a new year comes upon us, we know the date, time, and place for our first event. We’re happy to announce that our first event will be at Hive at 55! Once we get the event running on the Eventbrite page, we’ll notify you guys with the official information!

Lesson of the year:

If you work hard and don’t give up, you can make anything happen. After wonderful things happen to you, be prepared to keep it going!
